ko.qoute: 여긴 거실이야. 거의 TV 볼 때만 여기 있어. 좋지? 22인치야.

qoute: Oh, this is my living room. It's mostly just for watching TV. Nice, right? It's a 22inch.

ko.qoute: 아니, 잘 모르겠어.  가끔 같이 가는 건 괜찮아  뭐야. 네가 진짜 좋아하는 걸 같이 한 적은 있어?

qoute: No, but. I don't know. It's fun to go with him sometimes. Come on. Has he ever done anything with you that you actually like?

ko.qoute: 전 여기서 10년간 일했어요. 한 번이라도 병가를 내거나 일을 빠진 적이 있었나요?

qoute: I've been here ten years, right? Have I ever called in sick or missed a shift once?

ko.qoute: 크리스마스이브나 추수감사절에도 일했어요. 제 아들이 실종됐어요 어디 갔는지 모르겠다고요.

qoute: I've worked, uh, Christmas Eve and Thanksgiving. I don't know where my boy is. He's gone.

ko.qoute: 알았어? 엄마한테 네 얘기 안 할게 약속해. 약속? 절대 저버릴 수 없다는 뜻이야.

qoute: Do you understand? I won't tell her about you. I promise. Promise? It means something that you can't break.

ko.qoute: 이상하긴 해  나쁜 사람들이 쫓고 있대. 그 나쁜 사람들이 윌을 데려간 건지도 몰라.

qoute: That is weird. And she said bad people are after her. I think maybe these bad people are the same ones that took Will.
